description: This is a React component file defining the main application dashboard for an autonomous trading bot. It manages UI state, interacts with an API client for trading operations, and renders various components related to bot status, configuration, trading history, sentiment feed, key management, and risk settings.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main React functional component that manages the trading bot dashboard, state, and interactions.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Toggles the UI theme between light and dark modes.

methods.name: loadAll
methods.description: Loads the initial data for bot status, configuration, trades, and sentiment from the API.

methods.name: onStart
methods.description: Starts the trading bot via API and updates the status accordingly.

methods.name: onStop
methods.description: Stops the trading bot via API and updates the status accordingly.

methods.name: onSaveConfig
methods.description: Saves a new configuration by calling the API.

methods.name: onRiskChange
methods.description: Placeholder for handling risk configuration changes.

methods.name: onRiskCommit
methods.description: Commits risk configuration changes by saving the full configuration.

methods.name: onRefreshNews
methods.description: Refreshes sentiment/news data from the API.
